SEARCH
Package tetris.tetrominoes

Class TetrominoShadow

java.lang.Object
tetris.tetrominoes.Tetromino
tetris.tetrominoes.TetrominoShadow
public class TetrominoShadow extends Tetromino
Represents the "Ghost Piece" or Shadow.

The Shadow mimics the shape and rotation of a target Tetromino but is rendered semi-transparently at the bottom of the board to indicate where the piece will land.

  • Constructor Details

    • TetrominoShadow

      public TetrominoShadow(Tetromino parent)
      Creates a Shadow for the given parent tetromino.

      The shadow is initialized with the same shape and position, but with a color set to White with low alpha (transparency).

      Parameters:
      parent - The falling tetromino to track.

    • getApparentWidth

      public int getApparentWidth()
      Description copied from class: Tetromino
      Gets the visual width of the piece in its current rotation.

      Unlike Tetromino.getWidth(), which returns the matrix size, this returns the actual width of the filled blocks. Used for centering in the Next/Hold queues.

      Specified by:
      getApparentWidth in class Tetromino
      Returns:
      The apparent width in cells.

    • createCopy

      public Tetromino createCopy()
      Creates a copy of the shadow. Note: This recursively copies the parent piece to maintain independent state.
      Specified by:
      createCopy in class Tetromino
      Returns:
      A new instance with the same state.
